definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: leave, let alone (Targum [[שְׁבַק]], Syr. 4baq; cf. BH, p. 990);—

definitions.title: Pe.
definitions.body: Inf. [[לְמִשְׁבַּק]] Da 4:23 leave roots, so Imv. mpl. [[שְׁבֻ֫קוּ]] v:Da 4:12, v:Da 4:20 (both c. [[ב]] loc.); Ezr 6:7 let alone, c. [[ל]] acc. rei.

definitions.title: Hithpe.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[תִּשְׁתְּבִק]] Da 2:44 be left (of kingdom, + [[ל]] gent.).
